title: Delays and Fps/Ping issues.
body:
Greetings Riot 

I have been experiencing some issues. I have both a windows 7 laptop and a mac os x computer (yosemite version) and I have been experiencing high ping and FPS while in game. This has been happening since the Kalistar patch. However another issue is delays . What I mean is whenever I right click or press a button on my keyboard it doesn't react/detect fast enough and my champion just stands there for 4 seconds and then it does something. Basically its like a  pause and play.Where it pauses for 4 seconds or 5 seconds and then after it allows me to play. But the issue happens frequently and it annoys me.  As this is happening I am unable to view other parts of the map and I can't move my screen to see if others are experiencing this. 

I have been researching and so far I found someone thats facing a similar issue.  here is the link http://forums.oce.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=87461

 A quote from the link which seems to relate to my post 

> I don't know if its exactly the same as your issue from reading your post but I have been disconnecting at least 2 times a game for 3-5 seconds before it returns. I have no idea what would be causing this. I thought I wouldn't mind it and it would probably get fixed eventually but its already cost me some games by disconnecting in crucial teamfights.

Please try and fix this ASAP. 

Thanks
Chut45

replies.body: Yes this problem is also a issue for me. Please riot fix this. Not sure if this issue for windows but Mac users are affected. :(
